The tone was set very quickly: \"To wake up is to be born again in the world of despair.\" 'On Sunday afternoon' is a film all at once clinical and theoretical on melancholy in the strong sense of the famous \"black bile\" of the Greeks whose author seems to want to make a complete turn, from his tragic dimension to his psychological dimension, even ending his film with a long quote from Freud's 'Mourning and Melancholia'.","popularity":4.501,"poster_path":"/phcvz0ABypKlGEpKdxYWfRmgWrw.jpg","release_date":"1967-01-01","title":"On Sunday Afternoon","video":false,"vote_average":3.8,"vote_count":4},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/57m1VoLxN2dfY8Pss3Qb1f4N3Hj.jpg","genre_ids":[10749,10770],"id":744948,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Christmas Ever After","overview":"Popular romance novelist Izzi Simmons spends every Christmas at her favorite snowy bed \u0026 breakfast, but this year, she's faced with an impending deadline and a severe case of writer's block. Like Chris Marker, Félix Fattal builds a dynamic story from static images in Après nous, le déluge. The near-total lack of movement encourages the viewer to look into the texture of the imagery itself, lending it a haptic quality.","popularity":3.781,"poster_path":"/e9IwyWIQ6AXaQHe03fSpLdW5jND.jpg","release_date":"2019-01-01","title":"After Us, the Flood","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[99],"id":763036,"original_language":"cn","original_title":"暴動之後，光復之前","overview":"2019 in Hong Kong, protests become our daily life. The stuffs in the streets after each protest are changing our urban landscape, and they become the view of our everyday life. Graffitis on walls, unscrewed railings, bricks, respirators, safety goggles. Everything records what has happened in the city and witnesses our beliefs. I walked through the streets with my camera after protests. Mr. LIU Yi Chang let the objects tell the story in his nouveau roman short story, Riot, in 1968. Likewise, I let the objects play the narrators and tell us about the protests. Moreover, there are conversations and dialectic between different narrators…","popularity":0.185,"poster_path":"/7Udbl5AJYbVIFh53Tjb2Lv8CFbY.jpg","release_date":"2020-10-17","title":"After the Riots, Before the Liberation","video":false,"vote_average":0.0,"vote_count":0}],"total_pages":8,"total_results":145}
